'''Garibald Tarwick''' is the Lord of [[House Tarwick]]. He appears in ''[[Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series]]''.
sections.History:
==="[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"===
Lord Tarwick was invited to the [[Purple Wedding|royal wedding]]. While there, he conversed with [[Morgryn|Lord Morgryn]] before talking to [[Sera Flowers]], who hoped to marry a suitable noble.
